select tat.V_APPID,tat.ID,tat.V_SECRET,tat.V_APP_NAME,tat.V_RATE,tat.V_WX_RATE,tat.V_FORMALITIES ,tat.V_IS_MATCH,tsub.USER_ACCOUNT V_USER_ACCOUNT,tsub.USER_PHONE V_USER_PHONE,tsub.USER_ID V_USER_ID,tsur.ROLE_ID V_ROLE_ID ,tct.V_WX_COLLECTION,tct.V_ALI_COLLECTION,tct.V_TOTAL_COLLECTION,tct.V_CASH_COLLECTION from t_app_tab tat left join t_collection_tab tct on tat.ID = tct.V_APP_ID left join t_sys_user_base tsub on tat.V_USER_ID = tsub.USER_ID left join t_sys_user_role tsur on tsub.USER_ID = tsur.USER_ID
AND (tat.V_CREATE_USER = #{USER_ID} or tsub.USER_ID = #{USER_ID})
and tat.V_APP_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{V_APP_NAME}, '%')
and tsub.USER_ACCOUNT like CONCAT('%', #{V_USER_ACCOUNT}, '%')
order by tat.V_UPDATE_TIME desc
